member.name: F:MilkCum.Core.EMDefOf.EM_Defaults
member.summary: 建议 22：关键默认值 Def，可被其他 mod patch；ApplyDefaultsFromDef 使用。

member.name: T:MilkCum.Core.EqualMilkingDefaultsDef
member.summary: 建议 22：关键默认值 Def，供其他 mod 通过 PatchOperation 覆盖；可用「从 Def 加载默认」按钮应用。

member.name: F:MilkCum.Core.EqualMilkingDefaultsDef.defaultFlowMultiplierForHumanlike
member.summary: 流速倍率；默认 2 = 单次剂量约 1 日灌满。

member.name: F:MilkCum.Core.EqualMilkingSettings.milkingWorkTotalBase
member.summary: 按容量量化：挤奶工作量基准（原版 400），实际工作量 = 基准 × 容量系数。

member.name: F:MilkCum.Core.EqualMilkingSettings.milkingCapacityFactor
member.summary: 按容量量化：挤奶工作量随 MilkAmount 的系数，work *= (1 + 本值×(MilkAmount-1))，限制在 [0.5, 2.5]。

member.name: F:MilkCum.Core.EqualMilkingSettings.breastfeedCapacityFactor
member.summary: 按容量量化：吸奶有效时间随喂奶者 MilkAmount 的系数，effectiveTime *= (1 + 本值×(MilkAmount-1))，限制在 [0.5, 2]。

member.name: F:MilkCum.Core.EqualMilkingSettings.lactationExtraNutritionBasis
member.summary: 泌乳灌满期间额外饥饿：滑块 0–300，150=1:1。饱食度每 150 tick 额外下降 = flowPerDay×(150/60000)×(本值/150)。

member.name: F:MilkCum.Core.EqualMilkingSettings.rjwBreastCapacityCoefficient
member.summary: 乳房容量系数：左右乳容量 = RJW Severity × 本系数，2=默认，与泌乳效率等可调项对应。

member.name: F:MilkCum.Core.EqualMilkingSettings.rjwSexAddsLactationBoost
member.summary: 3.2：性行为后为泌乳参与者增加少量池进水（ΔL），可选。

member.name: M:MilkCum.Core.EqualMilkingSettings.GetEffectiveBaseValueTForDecay
member.summary: 药物泌乳衰减用有效 B_T：由 baselineMilkDurationDays 反推，使单次剂量（L≈0.5、E=1）时剩余天数 ≈ 基准天数。D=0.5/baseline ⇒ B_T_eff=1/(0.5/baseline−k×0.5)。

member.name: M:MilkCum.Core.EqualMilkingSettings.EnsureScribeDeepTypes
member.summary: 确保 Scribe_Deep 反序列化的对象类型正确，避免旧存档或类型变更导致 InvalidCastException。

member.name: M:MilkCum.Core.EqualMilkingSettings.ApplyDefaultsFromDef
member.summary: 建议 22：从 EqualMilkingDefaultsDef 加载关键默认值到当前设置（可被其他 mod patch 的 Def）。

member.name: M:MilkCum.Core.EqualMilkingSettings.GetRaceDrugDeltaSMultiplier(Verse.Pawn)
member.summary: 当前催乳素耐受严重度 t ∈ [0,1]；完全由游戏内 Hediff/Comp 决定。
3.3 动物差异化：种族对催乳药物进水倍率，未配置则 1。

member.name: M:MilkCum.Core.EqualMilkingSettings.GetProlactinToleranceFactor(Verse.Pawn)
member.summary: 统一耐受系数：E_tol(t) = max(1 − t, 0.05)。

member.name: M:MilkCum.Core.EqualMilkingSettings.GetProlactinToleranceFactor(System.Single)
member.summary: 统一耐受系数（按严重度 t）：E_tol(t) = [max(1 − t, 0.05)]^exponent；allowToleranceAffectMilk 关闭时恒为 1。

member.name: T:MilkCum.Core.MilkRiskSettings

member.name: F:MilkCum.Core.MilkRiskSettings.mastitisMtbDaysMultiplierHumanlike

member.name: T:MilkCum.Milk.Comps.CompCumBucketLink
member.summary: 精液桶/椅/泵关联床：可链接到一张床。 链接后仅床主可使用，产主精液 = 床主（即收集的精液一律记为床主产生）。 未链接时多人可使用，多人用过则为混合精液（无产主）。 若罐内已有精液且产主不是该床的床主，则无法链接到该床（CanLinkToBed 为 false，弹窗提示）。

member.name: P:MilkCum.Milk.Comps.CompCumBucketLink.Owner
member.summary: 床主（通过 CompAssignableToPawn 获取，兼容各版本）。

member.name: P:MilkCum.Milk.Comps.CompCumBucketLink.IsSharedRoom
member.summary: 共享卧室：房间内多张床，或链接的床无主。

member.name: P:MilkCum.Milk.Comps.CompCumBucketLink.HasContent

member.name: M:MilkCum.Milk.Comps.CompCumBucketLink.CanLinkToBed(RimWorld.Building_Bed)
member.summary: 桶内有精液时，仅当所有精液均属于该床主（或无产主）时才允许关联；否则返回 false 并应由调用方提示无法链接。

member.name: M:MilkCum.Milk.Comps.CompCumBucketLink.CanPawnUse(Verse.Pawn)

member.name: M:MilkCum.Milk.Comps.CompCumBucketLink.NotifyPawnUsed(Verse.Pawn)
member.summary: 记录该小人向此桶排放了一次；若多人用过则后续产出为混合精液。

member.name: P:MilkCum.Milk.Comps.CompCumBucketLink.IsMixed

member.name: F:MilkCum.Milk.Comps.CompEquallyMilkable.leftFullness
member.summary: 水池模型：左乳水位（0～左乳容量），与右乳合计 0～maxFullness；总容量 = 左+右（正常人 1+1=2）。

member.name: F:MilkCum.Milk.Comps.CompEquallyMilkable.rightFullness
member.summary: 水池模型：右乳水位（0～右乳基础容量），与左乳合计 0～maxFullness。

member.name: F:MilkCum.Milk.Comps.CompEquallyMilkable.HalfPool
member.summary: 旧实现与旧存档兼容：固定单侧容量 0.5；当前容量由 GetLeft/RightBreastCapacityFactor 决定（总容量=左+右）。

member.name: P:MilkCum.Milk.Comps.CompEquallyMilkable.Fullness
member.summary: 当前总奶量（0~maxFullness），双池时 = leftFullness + rightFullness；对外只读。

member.summary: 谁可以使用我产出的奶/精液制品（不含自己，自己始终允许）。空列表 = 仅自己；非空 = 自己+列表中人。囚犯/奴隶产主时亦不默认允许殖民者（7.4）。

member.name: M:MilkCum.Milk.Comps.CompEquallyMilkable.ClearPools
member.summary: 泌乳结束时清空双池（由 HediffComp_EqualMilkingLactating 调用）。

member.name: M:MilkCum.Milk.Comps.CompEquallyMilkable.EnsureSaveCompatAllowedLists

member.name: M:MilkCum.Milk.Comps.CompEquallyMilkable.ApplyDrugInducedLactationEffects
member.summary: 药物诱发泌乳负担与增益 Hediff；不依赖 Active，以便停止泌乳或失去耐受/成瘾时能移除。状态变化时才增删 Hediff，减少每 30 tick 的重复查找。见 Docs/泌乳系统逻辑图。

member.name: M:MilkCum.Milk.Comps.CompEquallyMilkable.UpdateMilkPools
member.summary: 水池模型：左/右池流速分别直接计算，双池流速=左+右；溢出、回缩（含健康度系数），更新满池计数。

member.name: M:MilkCum.Milk.Comps.CompEquallyMilkable.TrySendFullPoolLetter
member.summary: 3.3 满池事件：满池超过约 1 天且开启设置时，每 2 天最多发一封「需要挤奶」提醒信。见 Docs/泌乳系统逻辑图。

member.name: M:MilkCum.Milk.Comps.CompEquallyMilkable.HandleOverflow(System.Single)
member.summary: 满池溢出：累计溢出量达到阈值时生成地面污物（不扣水位）；污物 Def 由设置指定。

member.name: M:MilkCum.Milk.Comps.CompEquallyMilkable.UpdateHealthHediffs
member.summary: 满池时添加「乳房胀满」hediff；低于 90% maxFullness 时移除（滞后避免抖动）。

member.name: M:MilkCum.Milk.Comps.CompEquallyMilkable.SetFullness(System.Single)
member.summary: 设置总奶量（0～1）。从双池中排出至目标值，先排最满一侧，相同时男左女右。

member.name: M:MilkCum.Milk.Comps.CompEquallyMilkable.Gathered(Verse.Pawn)

member.summary: 规格：乳腺炎/堵塞可由长时间满池、卫生、受伤等触发。每 2000 tick 判定一次；参数由 EqualMilkingSettings 可调；营养好则 MTB 延长（风险降低）。

member.name: F:MilkCum.Milk.Helpers.PoolModelConstants.BaseValueT
member.summary: 基础值_T（B_T）：每日基础衰减 = 1/(B_T×有效药效系数)。

member.name: F:MilkCum.Milk.Helpers.PoolModelConstants.BaseValueTBirth
member.summary: 分娩时 L 增量（不乘有效药效系数），单位与 L 一致（归一化容量）。

member.name: F:MilkCum.Milk.Helpers.PoolModelConstants.EffectiveDrugFactorMin
member.summary: 有效药效系数下限：max(1−耐受, 0.05)。

member.name: F:MilkCum.Milk.Helpers.PoolModelConstants.NegativeFeedbackK
member.summary: 负反馈系数 k：每日衰减 = 1/(B_T×E) + k×L。τ≈1/k 游戏日。建议 [0.002, 0.05]。

member.name: F:MilkCum.Milk.Helpers.PoolModelConstants.LactationEndEpsilon
member.summary: L 下限：L 小于此值时视为 0，泌乳结束。避免浮点长期接近 0 不结束。

member.name: F:MilkCum.Milk.Helpers.PoolModelConstants.BaseAbsorptionDelayTicks
member.summary: 吸收延迟：基准 tick 数（0.25 游戏日）。实际延迟 = BaseAbsorptionDelayTicks / Clamp(代谢率, 0.25, 2)。

member.name: F:MilkCum.Milk.Helpers.PoolModelConstants.StretchCapFactor
member.summary: 满池撑大：单侧最大水位 = HalfPool × StretchCapFactor（规格：暂时允许超过基础容量）。

member.name: F:MilkCum.Milk.Helpers.PoolModelConstants.OverflowFilthThreshold
member.summary: 溢出污物：累计溢出量达到此阈值时生成 1 格地面污物（不扣水位）。

member.name: F:MilkCum.Milk.Helpers.PoolModelConstants.ShrinkPerStep
member.summary: 排水后回缩：每 30 tick 超出基础容量部分乘以 (1 - ShrinkPerStep)，约 0.5 游戏日回缩到基础容量。

member.name: F:MilkCum.Milk.Helpers.PoolModelConstants.DoseToLFactor
member.summary: 剂量转 L 系数 C_dose：ΔL = Δs × C_dose × E_tol(t_before)。默认 1。

member.name: T:Cumpilation.Bukkake.BukkakeUtility
member.summary:
Initializes and Manages both the "Per Body-Part" Splashes on Bukkake as well as their controllers.
DevNote: Initially, the Bukkake implementation from Ed86-Cum had two mechanics that got removed. 1) The body-parts had a "Overspill" logic which means that if your chest was full, you'd get splashes on the arms and legs. 2) The Controller would calculate itself regularly. This is now done upon spawning parts and the controller just ticks down.
Also, all drawing got removed. The drawing framework people should take care of that (#Innocent)

member.name: M:Cumpilation.Bukkake.BukkakeUtility.CanBeCovered(Verse.Pawn)
member.summary: Simple check if the pawn can be covered with fluids. Only some sanity checks and ruling animals out.
member.param: The pawn that might be covered.
member.returns: True if the pawn can be covered by fluid, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Cumpilation.Bukkake.BukkakeUtility.PartitionSeverity(System.Single,System.Int32,System.Single)
member.summary: Partitions a float into a sub-list of smaller floats whose sum is the initialSeverity. There will be atmost 3 * initialseverity parts, or max_parts, whatever is smaller. The size of each partition is capped at 1.0 (default).
member.param: Max number of partitions to create, default capped at 10
Max value for each entry, default capped at 1.0
member.returns: A list of floats whose sum is the original severity.

member.name: M:Cumpilation.Bukkake.BukkakeUtility.TicksToCleanSplashFromSelf(Verse.Hediff,System.Single)
member.summary: Looks up the ticks (time) required to clean a splash from a body-part. In case of any error, null value or other issues, 240 (2s) is returned, which was the original cleanup time from frameworks. If the severity is lower (or higher) than 1, it is considerd as a linear co-efficient.

member.name: F:Cumpilation.Bukkake.HediffCompProperties_SpawnOrAdjustControllerHediff.summedSeverityRequiredForFullController
member.summary: How many of the sub-hediffs severity are required to have a 1.0 Severity of the corresponding Controller. Default 4.5 "full" (=Severity 1.0) parts to reach the full bukkake. For a normal pawn, there should be 6 or 7 bodyparts, so 4.5 is already quite a lot.

member.param: The hediff to store a record in
The pawn that originated the Fluid
The type of fluid
The amount of fluid

Checks if the pawn is on the players home map.
Reason is that drones should only be punished for absence of queen if they are on the map and there is no queen. If they are on a mission, transport-pod etc. they should not get boni or mali.

member.summary:
This method finds all relevant, targetted parts as specified.
A sanity check, if the pawn is valid / healthy and matches the configuration, is done earlier in `IsValidPawn`.
member.param: The pawn for which to find SexParts.
Consider Penises (using `RJW.PartHelper.Is_Penis`)
Consider Vaginas (using `RJW.PartHelper.Is_Vagina`)
Consider Breasts (using HomeBrew helper)
Consider Anus (using `RJW.PartHelper.Is_Anus`)
Consider SexParts that are not in any other category
only return the first (fitting) part.
only return parts that have fluid.
member.returns: All targetted SexParts of the pawn, or an empty List on Errors.

member.summary:
Calculates the resulting Cumflation-Severity relative to the fluid-amount and pawns body size. Also used to determine "overflow".
This method is also used to determine "cumstuffed" despite the name.

member.name: M:Cumpilation.Cumflation.CumflationUtility.FluidAmountRequiredToCumflatePawn(Verse.Pawn,rjw.SexFluidDef)
member.summary:
We assume a simple relation: 100 fluid per 1 Bodysize. The returning value will determine how much of the fluid is necessary for 1.0 cumflation severity.
This might be altered with Patches etc. or extra behaviour, which is why this is a separate method despite very simple logic.
member.param: The pawn for which
Optional for patches: For which fluid to check.
member.returns: A number how much fluid amount is necessary for a "full" cumflation, i.E. a cumflation result resulting in 1.0 cumflation severity.

member.name: T:Cumpilation.Cumflation.HediffCompProperties_SharedSeverityPerDay
member.summary:
Extension to the "HediffComp_SeverityPerDay" that adjusts depending on how many Hediffs with this Comp are present.
Example: You have 1 hediff with `-0.10` SeverityPerDay. It will behave as normal. Example 2: You have 3 hediffs with `-0.15` SeverityPerDay each. Because you have three, they will effectively reduce by `-0.05` each day, resulting in a "global" reduction of 0.15 amongst all.

member.name: F:Cumpilation.Cumflation.HediffCompProperties_VomitFluidMtb.mtbDays
member.summary: "mean time between" measured in days. If set to 1, there will be 1 vomiting per days (in random occurrence). If set to 2, there will be 0.5 vomiting per days, etc. If set to 0.1, there will be 10 vomitings per days

member.name: F:Cumpilation.Cumflation.HediffCompProperties_VomitFluidMtb.scaleWithSeverity
member.summary: If true, the "chance" of application is scaled with the Severity of the Stuffing. So if your stuffing is 1.0, it will have a "full mtbDays". Otherwise, if your stuffing is 0.5, it will will result in half as much Vomiting.

member.name: T:Cumpilation.Cumflation.HediffComp_SharedSeverityPerDay
member.summary:
Extension to the "HediffComp_SeverityPerDay" that adjusts depending on how many Hediffs with this Comp are present.
Example: You have 1 hediff with `-0.10` SeverityPerDay. It will behave as normal. Example 2: You have 3 hediffs with `-0.15` SeverityPerDay each. Because you have three, they will effectively reduce by `-0.05` each day, resulting in a "global" reduction of 0.15 amongst all.

member.name: M:HediffComp_EqualMilkingLactating.ExtraEnergyPerDay
member.summary: 机械体灌满期间额外能量/天：与产奶流速 1:1 平衡，flowPerDay（池单位/天）× nutritionToEnergyFactor；满池后不额外消耗。

member.name: M:HediffComp_EqualMilkingLactating.GetFlowPerDay
member.summary: 当前产奶流速（池单位/天）= 左池流速 + 右池流速；与 CompEquallyMilkable 一致。左池流速 = 左乳 RJW × L×饥饿×Conditions×Genes×流速倍率，右池流速 = 右乳 RJW × 同上；满池或不可产奶时返回 0。
